acceptance-test-run.title: Write new email and save it in draft folder
acceptance-test-run.name: Write new email and save it in draft folder

test-group.name: Given the user is on Home Yandex page
When the user writes emailSubject 'test module 5'

When the user save draft email with 'Hello!

This is test of Module 5.

Bye'

test-step.description: Save draft email: Hello! This is test of Module 5. Bye
